jeudeloie

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • jeudeloie.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Game is the class which contains all the core rules of the game.

    It is a class containing :

    • A list of players.
    • A board.
    • An index of the current player.

    Author:
    Theo Plockyn & Remy Debue

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(java.util.List<Player> players, Board board)
      The constructor needs the players and an implementation of board.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int diceThrow()
      Throws the dice ( 2d6 )
      Player getWinner()
      Gets the winner.
      boolean isFinished()
      Checks if the game is finished, that is to say somebody is on the last cell, or nobody can move due to traps.
      Player nextPlayer()
      Gets the next player in the list, for the next turn.
      void play()
      The most important method of this class, which plays the game until there's a winner or everybody is trapped.

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public void play()
        The most important method of this class, which plays the game until there's a winner or everybody is trapped.

      • nextPlayer

        public Player nextPlayer()
        Gets the next player in the list, for the next turn.
        Returns:
        the next player

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()
        Checks if the game is finished, that is to say somebody is on the last cell, or nobody can move due to traps.
        Returns:
        true if it is finished, else false

      • diceThrow

        public int diceThrow()
        Throws the dice ( 2d6 )
        Returns:
        the value of the throw

      • getWinner

        public Player getWinner()
        Gets the winner.
        Returns:
        the winning player, or null if there's no winner.
